distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for bluez fixes the following issue:

- CVE-2016-9798: Fixed a use-after-free in conf_opt (bsc#1013712).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In BlueZ 5.42, a use-after-free was identified in "conf_opt" function in "tools/parser/l2cap.c" source file. This issue can be triggered by processing a corrupted dump file and will result in hcidump crash.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
